Store: Chris Pine  (Actor),     Zachary Quinto  (Actor),     J.J. Abrams  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Award Winners in Movies & TV, Oscar Central, Past Oscar Winners
Product Description: ['When the crew of the Enterprise is called back home, they find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization has detonated the fleet and everything it stands for, leaving our world in a state of crisis. With a personal score to settle, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction. As our heroes are propelled into an epic chess game of life and death, love will be challenged, friendships will be torn apart, and sacrifices must be made for the only family Kirk has left: his crew. The digital code works irrespective of the expiry date.']

reference_summary:
After Earth [Blu-ray + DVD]
Jaden Smith  (Actor),     Will Smith  (Actor, Producer),     M. Shyamalan  (Director, Producer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanity’s escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a treacherous journey to signal for help. They must learn to work together and trust each other, if they want any chance of returning home.']

Great adventure flick. Rare to see a movie that handles issues between father and son and one that showcases both as really willing to try. Didn't make a joke out of Dad or of the son
Surprisingly entertaining!!!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Preferences:** Enjoys movies, particularly in the Sci-Fi and Adventure genres. Prefers formats such as Blu-ray and values high-quality viewing experiences.

- **Themes:** Appreciates narratives that explore complex family dynamics, especially father-son relationships. Shows a preference for stories that emphasize cooperation and trust, with recent interactions highlighting enjoyment in character-driven stories featuring strong ties among crew members.

- **Emotional Engagement:** Values films that provide genuine emotional depth rather than surface-level comedy. Recent reviews indicate an appreciation for how humor can complement storytelling without overwhelming it.

- **Rating Behavior:** Tends to rate films favorably, typically seeking out engaging content. A recent interaction reflects a strong positive response, emphasizing an overall enjoyment of adventure and emotional stakes in narratives.

- **Production Quality:** Favors works by well-known actors and directors, showing an inclination towards established talents in the film industry. Recent selections reaffirm this preference for high-caliber storytelling combined with impressive cast performances.

Overall, the user demonstrates a clear preference for thoughtfully constructed films that blend adventure with emotional resonance, often involving family-like bonds among characters, complemented by high production standards and quality humor.
